title: Bug 10403: Confirmation needed for scrubbing the bin directory during project creation
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, we should confirm whether the output directory can be deleted and rebuilt. Currently, some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder to a bin directory which contains more than just .class files. These additional files cannot be rebuilt from the available .java files.
EB: During project creation, there should be a confirmation step to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
